title: Spacious one bedrooms available for immediate move-in!
posting_body: Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.
Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.
-24-Hour Athletic Centers Featuring Cardio, Free Weights, and Yoga Room
-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!
-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park
-Two Entertainment Plazas Featuring a Pool, Spa, and Private Cabanas
-Two Vibrant Clubhouses with Plasma TV/DVD Player and Java Bar
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
